articles.title: Caitlin Clark and the Indiana Fever beat the Sun as the WNBA shows off its star in Boston - AP News
articles.description: Indiana Fever star Caitlin Clark left Tuesday night’s game in the final minute holding back tears after grabbing at her leg — an apparent injury that would be her third this season. Clark walked back downcourt holding her right groin after assisting on the Fe…
articles.content:
BOSTON (AP) Indiana Fever star Caitlin Clark left Tuesday nights game in the final minute holding back tears after grabbing at her leg an apparent injury that would be her third this season.
